name: Nefarious
description: Play as the villain in Nefarious! An action platformer where you globe hop between several kingdoms kidnapping princesses who alter gameplay in unique ways. Then thwart various heroes in reverse boss fights, recreated iconic battles where you control the boss.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card Storage: 2 GB available space
